meanings.sent1: The ancient tablet had a hieroglyphic that represented the sun.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologist studied the hieroglyphic to decipher its meaning.
meanings.sent3: The children played a game where they had to guess the meaning of each hieroglyphic.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the hieroglyphic on the wall seemed to whisper secrets of the past.
meanings.sent5: The hieroglyphic of a bird was beautifully etched into the stone.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed an ancient hieroglyphic tablet.
meanings.sent2: The hieroglyphic language was used by the ancient Egyptians.
meanings.sent3: The hieroglyphic art class taught students how to draw ancient symbols.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was adorned with hieroglyphic patterns that glimmered in the light.
meanings.sent5: The hieroglyphic carvings on the temple walls told stories of gods and pharaohs.

meanings.definition: Written in or composed of hieroglyphs.
meanings.sent1: The scroll contained a hieroglyphic message from the pharaoh.
meanings.sent2: The hieroglyphic inscription on the tomb was beautifully preserved.
meanings.sent3: The hieroglyphic letter was so intricate that it took hours to decode.
meanings.sent4: His notebook was filled with hieroglyphic doodles during the boring lecture.
meanings.sent5: The hieroglyphic text on the papyrus scroll was a mystery waiting to be solved.
